import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'../App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Register(){const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[pass,setPass]=useState('');const[role,setRole]=useState('user');// дефолтная роль - пользователь
const[error,setError]=useState('');const[success,setSuccess]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();async function handleSubmit(e){e.preventDefault();if(!email||!pass){setError('Error: Please check your inputs.');setSuccess('');return;}setError('');// Отправляем email, password, role на backend
try{const res=await fetch('http://localhost:8080/api/auth/register',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({email,password:pass,role})});const data=await res.json();if(res.ok){setSuccess('Success: Registration complete!');setError('');// Можно автоматически перейти на логин
setTimeout(()=>navigate('/login'),1500);}else{setError(data.error||'Registration failed');setSuccess('');}}catch(err){setError('Network error');setSuccess('');}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Create Your Account"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Email Address"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"input",type:"email",placeholder:"your.email@example.com",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"input",type:"password",placeholder:"********",value:pass,onChange:e=>setPass(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Role"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginBottom:'1rem'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:()=>setRole('user'),style:{marginRight:'1rem',backgroundColor:role==='user'?'#347cff':'#ccc',color:role==='user'?'#fff':'#000',padding:'0.5rem 1rem',border:'none',borderRadius:'5px',cursor:'pointer'},children:"User"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:()=>setRole('admin'),style:{backgroundColor:role==='admin'?'#347cff':'#ccc',color:role==='admin'?'#fff':'#000',padding:'0.5rem 1rem',border:'none',borderRadius:'5px',cursor:'pointer'},children:"Admin"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button",type:"submit",children:"Register"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"error",children:error}),success&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"success",children:success})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button",style:{marginTop:'1em',background:"#347cff",color:"#fff"},onClick:()=>navigate('/login'),children:"Already have an account?"})]});}export default Register;
